title: Sarah Silverman's revealing dress is getting everyone's attention

Kim Kardashian was letting it all hang out while walking in Paris with her now-husband Kanye West just days ahead of their Florence, Italy wedding.
Mrs. West isn't the only celeb to bare all. Click through the slideshow for more daring looks, starting with Jamie Lee Curtis in the 80s.

Heller, Getty Images Image 61 of 61 Sarah Silverman's revealing dress is getting everyone's attention 1 / 61 Back to Gallery Sarah Silverman is getting everyone's attention after stepping out on the red carpet in a revealing black dress at the screening of "I Smile Back" in Los Angeles last night.
As if the look isn't shocking on it's own, it's particularly noticeable on Silverman, given that the star usually sports a tomboy-ish look, complete with ironic graphic T-shirts, flannels, and jeans.
Beyonce, who was seen in a similar look earlier in the week, is getting attention for her dress but not for all of the right reasons. Queen Bey was seen shutting down her assistant, who was adjusting the star's attire to make it look (wait for it) flawless .
While on the red carpet, video shows Beyonce nonchalantly telling her assistant to "stop it," all the while smiling for the cameras.
Silverman and Beyonce aren't alone in this trend. Take a look at the gallery above for other dramatically low-cut dresses worn by the stars.
